pages.title: Warden Crafting
pages.text: To Upgrade Your Tools, Sword And Armour To Warden you will need a Warden Upgrade Template, A Heart Of The Deep and A Netherite Item to upgrade. $(br2)In the example on the next page we upgrade to a Warden Helmet.

pages.title: Warden Helmet
pages.text: The Warden Helmet is a powerful piece of equipment.$(br2)As long as you are wearing this helmet you are immune to darkness and blindness.$(br2)The Warden will still be able to smell you and he will still be able to sonic boom you, but with the power of sight, evading him becomes a lot easier.

pages.title: Smithing Recipe
pages.text: The Next Few pages contain the Smithing Recipes for Warden Equipment, Hover over the equiment with your cursor to see its stats
